question:
73rd Amendment of the Constitution seeks to provide which of the following to the Panchayati Raj Institutions?
(a) Constitutional status
(b) Financial autonomy
(c) Empowerment of marginalized sections of the rural population
(d) Decentralised planning
Choose the correct option from below:
explanation: The Constitution (73rd Amendment) Act was passed in 1992 and it came into effect on 24 April 1993. The Act empowered state governments to take the necessary steps that would lead to the formalisation of the gram panchayats and help them operate as units of self-governance. This Act added a new chapter into the Constitution called ‘Part IX: The Panchayats’.
